image_assets.prompt: A minimalist pixel art of a male Computer Science student standing still, wearing casual university attire, glasses, and holding a laptop, slightly animated in 3 frames for idle state.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with a light color palette including blues and greens for a calm university look
image_assets.description: Represents the male protagonist in idle animation within the game.

image_assets.prompt: A minimalist pixel art of a female Computer Science student standing still, with her hair up, wearing casual university attire, and holding a tablet, slightly animated in 3 frames for idle state.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with pastel color tones including pinks and purples
image_assets.description: Represents the female protagonist in idle animation within the game.

image_assets.prompt: A minimalist pixel art of a Computer Science student running, depicted in 6 frames. Features a dynamic pose with hair flowing, showing movement across the screen.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with a mix of vibrant colors to indicate fast movement
image_assets.description: Animation of the protagonist running, used during movement sequences.

image_assets.prompt: A minimalist pixel art of a Computer Science student jumping mid-air, with a determined look. Showcases 3 frames of animation to illustrate the jump arc.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with contrasting color to highlight action
image_assets.description: Used to depict the student character jumping obstacles in the game.

image_assets.prompt: Intimidating pixel art character depicting a boss for technical interviews. Includes idle, attacking, and defeated animations across 10 frames.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with dark reds and blacks for a formidable presence
image_assets.description: Main boss enemy character in technical interview levels, engaging in battles.

image_assets.prompt: Floating image of a pixel art code snippet, representing algorithm puzzles within the game. Static in nature with focus on coding elements.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with bright contrasting colors like orange and teal for puzzle visibility
image_assets.description: Static puzzle obstacles that players must solve to proceed.

image_assets.prompt: A pixel art university campus background featuring buildings, trees, and benches, lightly animated with blowing leaves.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with earthy tones and greens, emphasizing a tranquil campus setting
image_assets.description: Background for university level, setting the scene for early game segments.

image_assets.prompt: An office setting depicted in pixel art, with desks, computers, and workers, elements infuse life with faint computer glows.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with corporate color schemes like greys and blues
image_assets.description: Background for internship levels, portraying a corporate office environment.

image_assets.prompt: Urban pixel art background showing a cityscape with tall buildings and passersby, clouds drifting by add depth.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with vivid urban colors to enhance a bustling city feel
image_assets.description: Used as the setting for job hunting levels, reflecting the busy city atmosphere.

image_assets.prompt: Various pixel art items themed around coding, such as books and USB drives, twinkling animation showing desirability.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with a bright, eye-catching palette including yellows and blues
image_assets.description: Collectible items essential for progression and skill development in the game.

image_assets.prompt: A pixel art depiction of a computer code bug appearing as a glitchy element or virus, creating an obstacle for players.
image_assets.style: Pixel art with contrasting colors such as purples and reds to signify danger
image_assets.description: Obstacle that needs to be debugged or avoided, representing coding errors.

image_assets.prompt: Create a minimalist pixel art health bar for a coding-themed game. The design should feature small pixel hearts that diminish with health loss, set against a simple horizontal bar gradient background. The style should be reminiscent of the retro 8-bit era, using a color palette of red for health and grey for the border.
image_assets.description: The health bar displays player's remaining health using pixel hearts. Positioned at the top left of the HUD for easy visibility.

image_assets.prompt: Design a pixel art score indicator for a computer science themed game. The element should use a digital font style, typical of classic arcade games, displaying numerical scores in a vibrant yellow against a dark pixelated background.
image_assets.description: This UI element shows the player's current score. Located at the top right of the HUD.

image_assets.prompt: Create a skill level progression bar in a pixel art style representing the player's coding abilities. It should look like a skill tree with distinct nodes indicating different levels, connected by lines. Use a palette of green for progression and grey for unachieved levels, all in pixel art style.
image_assets.description: Indicates player's progress in skill acquisition, resembling a tree with nodes to represent levels. Displays at the side of the HUD.

image_assets.prompt: A rectangular pixel art button for the game's menu system. It should have a pressed and unpressed state, animations when selected, and a retro-style border. Use colors like blue and light grey for an inviting interface experience.
image_assets.description: Standard menu button for various in-game menus, including Start, Options, and Exit. Positioned within the menu panels.

image_assets.prompt: Design the main title screen of a coding-themed game. It should feature a stylized 8-bit text with the game’s name 'Code Quest: CS Student Journey' overlaid on a pixelated background depicting a coding environment.
image_assets.description: Main title screen displaying the game's name and initial start buttons, providing first impression when game launches.

image_assets.prompt: A pixel art dialog box for character interactions and tutorials. Design should follow a classical speech bubble with a retro pixel border aesthetic and a clean interior to display text. Use neutral colors like white and black with sharp pixel edges.
image_assets.description: Used for character dialogues and tutorial messages. Appears at the lower third of the screen during interactions.

image_assets.prompt: Design icons representing different programming skills in a pixel art style, such as a pixelated book for theory, a chip for hardware, and brackets for coding. Each should have a distinctive vibrant color.
image_assets.description: Icons for distinct programming skills, used within the skill progression system. Positioned alongside skill bars and trees in the UI.
